local_intent: Perform the place phase: move above plate center, lower until contact, place with gentle press, release the grape, verify release by ensuring the gripper is empty, then retreat.
assumptions: Grape is currently in the gripper before placement
coherence_with_global: Matches GLOBAL_BT place stage: MoveAbove(plate_center) -> LowerUntilContact(slow, 0.05, 10.0, 1200) -> PlaceAt(plate_center, yaw 0, press 10.0, 1200) -> OpenGripper(0.08, 800) -> verify not holding grape -> Retreat(0.1, 800).
